entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning and ending this afternoon then 40 percent chance of drizzle or rain showers late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023
